card1.title: Intuitive
card1.description: Easily store, send and receive your digital assets across multiple wallets

card2.title: Connected
card2.description: Neon uses the open-source WalletConnect protocol to securely connect your wallet to a growing catalogue of dApps

card3.title: Flexible
card3.description: Digital asset management has never been easier using the Neon desktop and mobile (Android and iOS) apps

card4.title: Integrated
card4.description: Simply connect to your Ledger hardware wallet to control your Ethereum and Neo assets, using the highest security standards

step1.formTitle: Please create a password to secure your wallet
step1.passwordError: Password must be at least {{length}} characters long

step3.formTitle: Enter an address, encrypted key, private key or mnemonic
step3.inputPlaceholder: Enter an address, key or mnemonic...
step3.importEncryptedDescription: Select the desired blockchain for your new account
step3.importEncryptedSubtitle: Your encrypted key has been recognised, please complete the below fields to continue.

step4.title: Please be patient, we are now setting up your wallet

send.title: Send Tokens
send.rightSideTitle: What tokens do you want to send?

sendSuccess.title: Your tokens have been sent successfully!

encryptKey.subtitle: Choose a passphrase to encrypt an existing key:
encryptKey.titleInput1: Enter the private key that you want to encrypt

error.privateKeyNotFound: Unable to validate the private key
error.confirmationPassphrase: Confirmation passphrase is different from the passphrase

settingsNetwork.title: Network Configuration
settingsNetwork.youAreConnectedNeoAndEth: You are connected to both the Neo and Ethereum networks

settingsBackupWallet.title: Backup NEON
settingsBackupWallet.description: Save a backup file to your computer that will allow you to restore your wallet in the event that you lose access or damage your device.
settingsBackupWallet.saveBackupLabel: Where would you like to save your backup?
settingsBackupWallet.warning: Note: This process will back up your entire wallet

settingsRecoverWallet.title: Import NEON Backup
settingsRecoverWallet.description: In the event that you lose access to you wallet, you can import it from a local backup file. Simply locate your local backup file and enter the password you used when you created the backup file and your access will be restored.

settingsMigrateWallets.title: Migrate from NEON 2.0
settingsMigrateWallets.descriptionWhy: Migrating your NEON 2 wallet will give you access to a broader range of supported assets, and a sleeker, improved user experience that will make the management of your assets a breeze!
settingsMigrateWallets.subtitleHow: How do I migrate from Neon 2?

step1.subtitle: If you’d like to create a new password, simply change it here and confirm the change with your current password!

step2.subtitle: If you lose your password, it isn’t retrievable.
step2.description: To complete your password change, you’ll need to make a backup of your new password. Tap the button below to get a QR code that you can download and keep safe.

step3.subtitle: Your NEON 3 password has been successfully changed!

receive.title: Receive Tokens
receive.selectAccountToGenerateCode: Select an account to generate a code!
receive.addressInputHint: Your receiving address will be here...
